account_help: You can reset or change your password by selecting 'Forgot Password' on the login page. If you're still unable to access your account, please contact our support team for help.
card_issue: If your card is lost, stolen, or damaged, please block it immediately through the mobile app or call our helpline at 1800-XXXX-XXXX. You can also request a replacement card from your account settings.
transaction_query: You can view or download your transaction history from the 'Transactions' section of your account dashboard. It includes all payments, transfers, and account activity.
account_closure: To close your account, please submit a closure request through customer support or your online account settings. Make sure all dues are cleared before requesting closure.
card_info: Our credit card interest rates range from 12% to 18% annually, depending on the card type. You can also request a credit limit increase from your account page or by contacting support.
refund_issue: Refunds are typically processed within 5–7 business days. If you haven’t received yours yet, please check your transaction history or contact support with your transaction ID for quick help.
contact_support: You can contact our customer support team anytime via chat, email at support@example.com, or by calling 1800-XXXX-XXXX. We’re always happy to help.
transaction_issue: If your payment failed or your transaction didn’t go through, please wait a few hours — sometimes banks take time to confirm. If money was deducted but not credited, share your transaction details with our support team for resolution.
